Posts.EditableText:
download and code at this link:

http://textadventures.co.uk/forum/quest/topic/yttvba_5o0katld5xx8zua/help-with-tickets-attributes#683a2c46-9b02-4be7-ab9b-d5992eea760c

was trying to make a skee ball game for Sheparoo, so he/she can study it in the GUI/Editor, and I think it's pretty cool and fun, as a simulation-code game, it feels jsut like the real/physical skee ball at arcade places, minus the physical throwing/rolling of the ball with your arm, lol.

thought I'd share it with everyone here (so it doesn't get lost in the forum board), for anyone/everyone to enjoy it and/or study from it.
